com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner

Class KsiBlockSignerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.ksi.blocksigner.KsiBlockSignerBuilder

  • public class KsiBlockSignerBuilder
extends Object
    This class provides functionality to obtain KsiBlockSigner object(s). This cass offers multiple methods to configure KsiBlockSigner object.
